name: Mendum Memoria
description:
Mendum Memoria is a short YNFG made for the Dream Diary Jam 4. An event made for the anniversary of the cult game Yume Nikki by Kikiyama.

The story follows Evan, a young boy who, by some cirscuntancies, must explore his dream world. In this world Evan will be faced by the most hidden memories within his head along his most precious things and fears.

This game contains (at the date of 03/07/2020)

  • 5 Dreams worlds to explore
  • 4 Effects to collect
  • 1 Event
  • 1 Ending

The main objetive of the game is to collect the 4 effects. Once you made it you will be able to see the ending in the real world.

Dev note: Due this game has been developed within the time span of a month it lacks of content that has been postponed to a future update. Either way I hope you can still enjoy the game as I enjoyed making it.

※ Warning: This game may contain sensitive topics and flashing lights. If you believe you can be affected in any way please play with caution.
